  • Uses of EventToServer in it.polimi.ingsw.events.clienttoserver

    Subclasses of EventToServer in it.polimi.ingsw.events.clienttoserver
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  PingToServer
    This event represents the ping that verifies the connection with the server.
    class  ReplayLorenzoActionToServer
    This class represents the event to send to the server as reply of the LorenzoActionToClient.
    class  SelectedProductionToServer
    This class represents the event of the selection of the power production turn to send to the server .
    class  SendLeaderCardToServer
    This class represents the event to send to the server with the information of the leader card action choose by the player.
    class  TurnPlayedToServer
    This class represent the event send to the server for the choose of the type of turn.
